name: Kumpels
description:
Make your dream of mining tycoon come true! Start with a little money and work your way up to a millionaire. Dig deeper and explore new resources to make your business even bigger and more complex.


Plan lorries and gondolas. Blow up the path or dig through the segment.

Poker for the best prices on the market and hoard resource until the market offers the best prices.

Improve your complex with increasing complexity through research and upgrades.


Research new resources and use the knowledge gained to find the coveted ores.
Find unique treasures and fill your cash register!


Take care of a stable business with your own power supply and homes for your buddies!




Properties:
  • 10 kinds of ores in different earth layers.
  • various buildings (mines, lorries, gondolas, warehouses, power stations, etc.)
  • Research (explore resources and buildings)
  • Random weather effects
  • Random Tiles Map
  • Upgrade of the buildings
  • wealth
  • Steam controller support
